item.name: 01. Introduction
item.description:
SalesHandy provides REST API to use services and integrate it to your system. Currently the APIs are utlized by SalesHandy Web Application, Chrome Plugin and Outlook Plugin. Later these APIs will be available for public use so that it can be integrated remotely to interact with SalesHandy. SalesHandy have resource oriented URLs and uses HTTP features like authentication, verbs, response codes which are understood by most of HTTP clients. SalesHandy uses JSON as communication medium. SalesHandy APIs are accessible at below endpoint: **Production**
[https://api.saleshandy.com](https://api.saleshandy.com) **Testing**
[https://api.cultofpassion.com](https://api.cultofpassion.com)

item.name: 02. Responses & Errors
item.description:
SalesHandy API responses are in JSON format. Every API call will return a valid JSON payload describing the object, operation performed or error details.

### Success Response Valid json data payload representing resource output.
_Example:_
``` { "message": "Your account has been created successfully." } ```
### Error Response Valid json data payload representing error details.
_Example:_
``` { "error": true, "error_code": 1001, "error_message": "Could not connect with database." } ```
### Error Codes in Response SalesHandy API utilizes HTTP status codes and custom error codes for error handling. **2xx** - OK
**4xx** - Something wrong with request body, headers, resource access
**5xx** - Server encounters an error
There are following **global / common** error codes which describes specific error details: | HTTP Status | Error Code | Description | |---------------|---------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------| | 500 | 1001 | Could not connect with database. | | 500 | 1002 | Database operation failed. Please try again. | | 500 | 1003 | Server encountered an error. Please try again. | | 404 | 1004 | Resource not found. | | 406 | 1005 | Incorrect value passed for header(s): | | 401 | 1006 | Authorization token is expired. Please login again. | | 406 | 1007 | Source header is missing from request. | | 406 | 1008 | Invalid value passed for source header. | | 406 | 1009 | Required headers missing from request: | | 405 | 1010 | Invalid HTTP method. | | 401 | 1011 | Please login to your account. | | 403 | 1012 | You are not authorized to access this resource. | | 402 | 1013 | Your plan does not include access to this resource. | | 400 | 1014 | Invalid request. Please correct following errors:\n | | 401 | 1015 | Your account is not active. | | 401 | 1016 | Your account is deleted. | | 401 | 1017 | Your account has been closed. | | 401 | 1018 | Your account has been deleted. | | 400 | 1019 | Your account is not verified. | | 404 | 1020 | Data which you are trying to access was not found. | | 400 | 1021 | Bad request. Requested URL is invalid. | | 500 | 1022 | Error while uploading image: | | 400 | 1023 | Incorrect value passed for status change. | | 2xx, 4xx, 5xx | 2xxx | Module specific errors (described in detail for each module) |

item.name: 03. General Guidelines
item.description:
### Authorization Header To identify that the request is made by valid user - API uses authorization header to be passed along with request. The resources which require user authorization, **MUST** pass authorization header to the request. When user logs in - SalesHandy returns authorization token which is valid for 30 mins. After that - user will have to login again. To generate authorization token - user will have to login with Login resource (later covered in documentation). Login uses **Basic Auth** for authentication. Once user is logged in, all the resources which requires authorization, will need to pass `X-Authorization-Token` header to validate the request.
### Source Header As mentioned earlier - SalesHandy APIs are utilized by SalesHandy Web Application, Chrome Plugin and Outlook Plugin. To identify that the request has come from which source, SalesHandy uses `X-SH-Source` header. Every request **MUST** send `X-SH-Source` header. Valid values for `X-SH-Source` header: | Value | Source | |-----------------------|---------------------------------------------------| | WEB_APP | SalesHandy Web Application | | CHROME_PLUGIN | Chrome Plugin | | OUTLOOK_PLUGIN | Outlook Plugin |
### Other Request Headers Every request **MUST** have following headers set on request: ``` Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8 Accept: application/json ```

item.name: 04. Login
item.description: Allow user to login to his/her account as SalesHandy.

request.description:
This resource is used to login to SalesHandy account. This resource uses HTTP Basic Authentication. You need to provide email address and password of your account to login.

**Request**
Below parameters needs to be passed at HTTP Basic Authenticator header: | Parameter | Details | |-------------------|-----------------------------------------------| | username | Email address of user | | password | Password of user | **Response**
On success, it returns `auth_token` token which is mandatory to pass on sub-sequent calls of API resources which requires user identification / login. | Parameter | Details | |-------------------|-----------------------------------------------| | auth_token | Authorization token of logged in user | On error, it returns error containing description. | HTTP Status | Error Code | Description | |---------------|---------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------| | 404 | 2001 | Invalid credentials. No account found. | > Including all global / common errors

header.value: X-SH-Source, X-Authorization-Token, X-Requested-With, Content-Type, Accept, Origin, Authorization
header.name: Access-Control-Allow-Headers

header.value: X-SH-Source, X-Authorization-Token, X-Requested-With, Content-Type, Accept, Origin, Authorization
header.name: Access-Control-Allow-Headers

request.description:
This resource is used to login to SalesHandy account with social media account. Currently only **Signin with Gmail** method is supported.

**Request**
Below parameters needs to be passed in URI: | Parameter | Details | |-------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------| | method | Valid method value | | | Possible values for `method`: | | | **GMAIL** | Below parameters needs to be passed in request: | Parameter | Details | |-------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------| | first_name | First name of user | | last_name | Last name of user | | email | Email address of user _[Valid email]_ | | token | Token recieved from social media API | **Response**
On success, it returns `auth_token` token which is mandatory to pass on sub-sequent calls of API resources which requires user identification / login. | Parameter | Details | |-------------------|-----------------------------------------------| | auth_token | Authorization token of logged in user | On error, it returns error containing description. | HTTP Status | Error Code | Description | |---------------|---------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------| | 400 | 2002 | Invalid value passed for social media account. | | 400 | 2003 | Token is invalid. Please try again later. | > Including all global / common errors

item.name: 05. Forgot Password
item.description: Allow user to reset his/her password if forgotten.

request.description:
This resource is used to initiate reset password request for SalesHandy account.

**Request**
Below parameters needs to be passed in request: | Parameter | Details | |-------------------|-----------------------------------------------| | email | Email address of user | **Response**
On success, it returns `message` and `code` suggesting that request for reset password was initiated successfully and an email to reset password instruction will be sent to email address of your account. `code` can be used to re-send password reset link again if not received. | Parameter | Details | |-------------------|-------------------------------------------------------| | code | Reset password link code | | message | Message describing operation performed successfully | On error, it returns error containing description. | HTTP Status | Error Code | Description | |---------------|---------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------| | 404 | 2071 | Could not find account with given details. | > Including all global / common errors

response.name: Invalid Request

header.value: X-SH-Source, X-Authorization-Token, X-Requested-With, Content-Type, Accept, Origin, Authorization
header.name: Access-Control-Allow-Headers

response.body: {"error":true,"error_code":2071,"error_message":"Could not find account with given details."}

request.description:
This resource is used to reset password from initiated reset password link.

**Request**
Below parameters needs to be passed in URI: | Parameter | Details | |-------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------| | code | Reset password link code recieved from forgot password initiate resource | Below parameters needs to be passed in request: | Parameter | Details | |-------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------| | password | New password of user _[Min 8 Characters]_ | **Response**
On success, it returns `message` describing password was reset successfully. | Parameter | Details | |-------------------|-------------------------------------------------------| | message | Message describing operation performed successfully | On error, it returns error containing description. | HTTP Status | Error Code | Description | |---------------|---------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | 404 | 2071 | Could not find account with given details. | | 400 | 2072 | Reset password url is not valid. | | 400 | 2073 | Reset password link is expired. Please request for another reset password link. | > Including all global / common errors

response.name: Valid Request

request.description:
This resource is used to check whether reset password link is valid or not.

**Request**
Below parameters needs to be passed in URI: | Parameter | Details | |-------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------| | code | Reset password link code recieved from forgot password initiate resource | **Response**
On success, it returns json payload containing information like the link is still valid to reset password. | Parameter | Details | |-------------------|-----------------------------------------------| | valid | boolean value `true`. | On error, it returns error containing description. | HTTP Status | Error Code | Description | |---------------|---------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | 400 | 2072 | Reset password url is not valid. | | 400 | 2073 | Reset password link is expired. Please request for another reset password link. | > Including all global / common errors

item.name: 06. Signup
item.description: Allows user to create his/her account at SalesHandy.

request.description:
This resource is used to create account at SalesHandy.

**Request**
Below parameters needs to be passed in request: | Parameter | Details | |-------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------| | first_name | First name of user | | last_name | Last name of user | | email | Email address of user _[Valid email]_ | | password | Password of user _[Min 8 Characters]_ | **Response**
On success, it returns `message` and `code` suggesting that signup request was successfully completed. A verification email is sent to user to verify his account. `code` can be used to re-send verification email to user if not recieved. It also returns `auth_token` which is required to access secured sections which requires authorization. | Parameter | Details | |-------------------|-------------------------------------------------------| | code | Account verification code | | message | Message describing operation performed successfully | | auth_token | Authorization token of user | On error, it returns error containing description. | HTTP Status | Error Code | Description | |---------------|---------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------| | 400 | 2026 | User with this email address already exists. | > Including all global / common errors

item.name: 07. My Profile
item.description:
Get logged in user information and his/her account preferences. It also allows user to update his/her details and preferences.

**REQUIRES AUTHORIZATION**

request.description:
This resource is used to get dashboard page information for logged in user.

**Response**
On success, it returns data objects for various information. | Parameter | Details | |-------------------|-------------------------------------------------------| | message | Message describing operation performed successfully | On error, it returns error containing description. > Including all global / common errors

request.description:
This resource is used to fetch logged in user information and preferences.

**Response**
On success, it returns object containing user information. | Parameter | Details | |-----------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------| | first_name | First name of user | | last_name | Last name of user | | email | Email address of user | | phone | Phone number of user | | photo | Image url of user photo | | last_login | Last login date time | | member_since | Registration date time | | preferences | Object containing preferences of user, if no preferences set then `null` | On error, it returns error containing description. > Including all global / common errors

**Request**

On success, it returns `message` describing password was changed successfully. | Parameter | Details | |-------------------|-------------------------------------------------------| | message | Message describing operation performed successfully | On error, it returns error containing description. | HTTP Status | Error Code | Description | |---------------|---------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | 400 | 2095 | Current password is incorrect. Please enter your correct current password. | > Including all global / common errors

request.description:
This resource is used to update preferences of user.

**Request**
Below parameters needs to be passed in request: | Parameter | Details | |-------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------| | setting | Preference key | | | `setting` parameter can have following values: | | | **U_SIGNATURE**: For signature preference | | | **U_TRACK_EMAILS**: Track emails? (1-Yes, 0-No) | | | **U_TRACK_REPLY**: Track reply? (1-Yes, 0-No) | | | **U_TRACK_CLICKS**: Track clicks? (1-Yes, 0-No) | | | **U_POWERED_BY_SH**: Enable powered by SalesHandy? (1-Yes, 0-No) | | | **U_BCC**: BCC email | | | **U_CC**: CC email | | | **U_TIMEZONE**: Timezone for account | | | **U_SNOOZE_NOTIFICATIONS**: Snooze all notifications | | value | Value of the Preference | **Response**
On success, it returns `message` describing preference was changed successfully. | Parameter | Details | |-------------------|-------------------------------------------------------| | message | Message describing operation performed successfully | On error, it returns error containing description. | HTTP Status | Error Code | Description | |---------------|---------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | 400 | 2091 | Trying to update invalid setting which is not supported. | > Including all global / common errors

item.name: 08. Email Accounts
item.description:
Allows user to manage email accounts.

**REQUIRES AUTHORIZATION**

request.description:
This resource is used to list mail sending account list.

**Request**
Below parameters can be passed in query string: | Parameter | Details | |-------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------| | page | _(Optional)_ Which page number listing data to be displayed (Default: 1) | | per_page | _(Optional)_ Number of records to display per page (Default: 25) | | order_by | _(Optional)_ Order in which listing should be displayed | | | `order_by` parameter can have following values: | | | **name**: Order by name column | | | **created_by**: Order by user who created the account | | order | _(Optional)_ Order method (ASC: for ascending order, DESC: for descending)| | user | _(Optional)_ Filter listing records by user (created by) | | type | _(Optional)_ Filter listing records by type (SMTP / GMAIL) | | query | _(Optional)_ Search string | **Response**
On success, it returns json object describing listing information. | Parameter | Details | |-------------------|-------------------------------------------------------| | total_records | Total number of records available in listing | | total_pages | Total number of pages to traverse | | current_page | Current page number of which listing data is shown | | per_page | Number of records to show per page | | rows | Array of objects describing account data | On error, it returns error containing description. > Including all global / common errors

header.value: X-SH-Source, X-Authorization-Token, X-Requested-With, Content-Type, Accept, Origin, Authorization
header.name: Access-Control-Allow-Headers
header.description: Used in response to a preflight request to indicate which HTTP headers can be used when making the actual request.

header.name: Access-Control-Allow-Methods
header.description: Specifies the method or methods allowed when accessing the resource. This is used in response to a preflight request.

header.name: Access-Control-Allow-Origin
header.description: Specifies a URI that may access the resource. For requests without credentials, the server may specify '*' as a wildcard, thereby allowing any origin to access the resource.

header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Length
header.description: The length of the response body in octets (8-bit bytes)

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Server
header.description: A name for the server

request.description:
This resource is used to connect new SMTP account.

**Request**
Below parameters needs to be passed in request: | Parameter | Details | |-------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------| | name | Name of the email account | | from_name | From name which will be displayed while email is sent from this account | | from_email | Email address from which emails need to be sent (displayed in from email) | | host | Host information of SMTP account | | username | Username of SMTP account | | password | Password of SMTP account | | encryption | Encryption to use while connection | | port | Port to use while connection _[Valid number]_ | **Response**
On success, it returns `message` describing data was saved successfully. | Parameter | Details | |-------------------|-------------------------------------------------------| | message | Message describing operation performed successfully | On error, it returns error containing description. > Including all global / common errors

request.description:
This resource is used to generate reports of SalesHandy account usage and performance.

**Response**
On success, it returns data objects for various information. | Parameter | Details | |-------------------|-------------------------------------------------------| | message | Message describing operation performed successfully | On error, it returns error containing description. > Including all global / common errors

item.name: 25. Logout
item.description:
Allows user to logout from SalesHandy account.

**REQUIRES AUTHORIZATION**

request.description:
This resource is used to logout from SalesHandy account. This will invalidate current authorization token.

**Response**
On success, it returns data objects for various information. | Parameter | Details | |-------------------|-------------------------------------------------------| | message | Message describing operation performed successfully | On error, it return error containing description. > Including all global / common errors

item.name: 26. List Resources
item.description:
Allows user to use list resources which are usefull to display only listing like data.

**REQUIRES AUTHORIZATION**

request.description:
This resource is used to get list of access routes which are accessible to logged in user.

**Response**
On success, it returns json array of resources which are assigned to user. On error, it returns error containing description. > Including all global / common errors
